name: The Art Critic
description:
Sometimes, everything can fall into place from a single decision. In "The Art Critic," such a reality can lend to wonderful achievements and strange discoveries. Who will Lucas become?

Lukas is a sickly-sweet art critic in the burgeoning city of New Austin in the year 2089. Coming up is the 1st annual NABAE (New Austin Biennial Art Exhibition), and Lukas is expected to make his important appearance. Unfortunately, his mother falls ill and requires his help.

As the player, you navigate Lukas through this exciting and tumultuous time in his life, using Lukas's Positive Critique mentality. Throughout the game, you provide a guiding hand to Lukas. Judge art, help his mother, reform the critique community, and uncover secret truths...
